Protocols/AnalyticsTracker.html#/s:5Trac.name: State
Protocols/AnalyticsTracker.html#/s:5Trac.abstract: A type that represents all the possible types that the tracker’s Event.state event can have.

Protocols/AnalyticsTracker.html#/s:5Trac.name: Action
Protocols/AnalyticsTracker.html#/s:5Trac.abstract: A type that represents all the possible types that the tracker’s Event.action event can have.

Protocols/AnalyticsTracker.html#/s:5Trac.name: ParameterKey
Protocols/AnalyticsTracker.html#/s:5Trac.abstract: A type that represents all the possible parameter keys that a tracker’s Event parameter dictionary can have.

Protocols/AnalyticsTracker.html#/s:5Trac.name: id
Protocols/AnalyticsTracker.html#/s:5Trac.abstract: The identifier of the tracker. The default is the tracker’s type name.

Protocols.html#/s:5Track21AnalyticsParam.name: AnalyticsParameterKey
Protocols.html#/s:5Track21AnalyticsParam.abstract: A type representing the key of an analytics event parameter dictionary.

Enums/Analytics/AnyAnalyticsTracker.html.name: init(_:)
Enums/Analytics/AnyAnalyticsTracker.html.abstract: Creates a type-erased instance of an analytics tracker that wraps the given instance.

Enums/Analytics/AnyAnalyticsTracker.html.name: track(_:)
Enums/Analytics/AnyAnalyticsTracker.html.abstract: Tracks an analytics event via the wrapped tracker.

Enums/Analytics/MultiTracker.html#/s:5Tr.name: register(_:)
Enums/Analytics/MultiTracker.html#/s:5Tr.abstract: Registers a sub tracker, and starts sending any new analytics events to it. This method is thread safe.

Enums/Analytics/MultiTracker.html#/s:5Tr.name: unregister(_:)
Enums/Analytics/MultiTracker.html#/s:5Tr.abstract: Unregisters a sub tracker, preventing any new analytics events from being sent to it. This method is thread

Enums/Analytics/MultiTracker.html#/s:5Tr.name: track(_:)
Enums/Analytics/MultiTracker.html#/s:5Tr.abstract: Tracks an analytics event, by propagating it to all the registered sub trackers.

Enums/Analytics/MultiTrackerError.html#/.name: duplicateTracker(_:)
Enums/Analytics/MultiTrackerError.html#/.abstract: A tracker with the same id already registered.

Enums/Analytics/MultiTrackerError.html#/.name: inexistentTracker(_:)
Enums/Analytics/MultiTrackerError.html#/.abstract: A tracker with the given id isn’t registered.

Enums/Analytics.html#/s:5Track9Analytics.name: Parameters
Enums/Analytics.html#/s:5Track9Analytics.abstract: A typealias representing a dictionary of analytics parameters.

Enums/Analytics/Event.html.name: Event
Enums/Analytics/Event.html.abstract: An analytics event representing either a state update or a user action, with an associated value and parameters.

Enums/Analytics/MultiTracker.html.name: MultiTracker
Enums/Analytics/MultiTracker.html.abstract: An analytics tracker that forwards analytics events to multiple trackers, while not doing any tracking on its

Enums/Analytics.html.name: Analytics
Enums/Analytics.html.abstract: A type representing the Analytics namespace (case-less enum).
